plham

Class IndexMarket

  • plham.Market
    • plham.IndexMarket

  • public class IndexMarket
extends Market
    IndexMarket is for a market (asset) associated with some underlying markets (assets).

    • Call addMarkets(List[Market]) to add underlying components.
    • Specify its index calculation scheme (plham.index.IndexScheme) (unset by default).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class plham.Market

        Market.AgentUpdate, Market.ExecutionLog, Market.MarketEvent, Market.OrderEvent
